mapper.select: SELECT PRD_NUM, CG_CODE, PRD_NAME, PRD_PRICE, PRD_DISCOUNT, PRD_PUBLISHER, PRD_CONTENT, PRD_UP_FOLDER, PRD_IMG, PRD_AMOUNT, PRD_BUY, PRD_DATE, PRD_UPDATEDATE FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(PRODUCT_TBL PK_PRD_NUM) */ ROWNUM RN, PRD_NUM, CG_CODE, PRD_NAME, PRD_PRICE, PRD_DISCOUNT, PRD_PUBLISHER, PRD_CONTENT, PRD_UP_FOLDER, PRD_IMG, PRD_AMOUNT, PRD_BUY, PRD_DATE, PRD_UPDATEDATE FROM PRODUCT_TBL WHERE cg_code = #{cg_code} AND ROWNUM <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE RN > (#{cri.pageNum} -1) * #{cri.amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT_TBL WHERE cg_code = #{cg_code}
